creator: simon.spruzen@rbos.com
text:
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.compilers.Jikes (silently) doesn't support the 
exdecutable attribute documented and supported by other compiler facades, so 
Jikes just has to be on the path. Can 
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.compilers.Jikes be enhanced to support the 
executable attribute?

Thanks.

The executable attribute will now be used by jikes, jvc, gcj and sj as well.
Fixed with nightly build 2003-05-16.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
